title: Social Studies Curriculum Material Redesign Workshop for Teacher Learning Support: Integrated Approach to Citizenship·Culture·Historical Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of elementary social studies curriculum (history/geography/economics/politics domains), foundational knowledge of core social studies concepts (citizenship, cultural diversity, historical context), and curriculum material analysis experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening social studies inquiry activities (field research, data analysis, discussions) in smartphone-enabled classrooms. Project-based assessments for practical learning that foster core social studies competencies: citizenship, cultural sensitivity, and historical thinking.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and explain three or more connections between educational support elements in social studies curriculum materials (civic literacy development, cultural diversity understanding, historical context analysis) and core competencies in social studies (civic literacy, cultural sensitivity, historical thinking).

Learners can redesign social studies curriculum materials for teacher professional development by applying an integrated approach (history, geography, economics, politics) to the social studies core concepts (citizen rights, institutional relationships, spatial awareness) and reconstruct them for practical educational settings.

Learners design two or more teaching-learning strategies (inquiry-based activities, case studies, discussion learning) to address students’ misconceptions about social concepts (citizen rights, institutional relationships, spatial awareness), integrate them into social studies curriculum materials, and enhance learners’ critical thinking skills.

Learners produce a project output (improvement plan for one textbook chapter) reflecting core competencies in social studies (civic literacy, cultural sensitivity, historical thinking) and submit a final revised version incorporating ≥70% of feedback from three peer evaluators.

resources: Existing Elementary Social Studies Curriculum Material Samples
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
